item.title: About
item.description: Welcome! I'm Sandy, I am passionate about math. My aim is to provide a safe, friendly, fun environment where the student will not only be successful but also enjoy learning. I commit to offering your child the care and attention he needs to succeed. I am patient, yet not content to let any student do less than their best. The pace will be tailored to your child's individual needs. I enjoy working with kids from both ends of the spectrum - from those who are behind to those who are seeking more of a challenge.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Message sent! Have a question or want to know more? Leave me a Message below Full Name: Phone Number: Email Address: Message: Send Message Or reach me directly Phone: (561) 654-1889 Email: sandytiller@yahoo.com Just trying to find the place? 5054 Knotty Pine Court, Sanford, FL 32771

item.title: Services
item.description: TROUBLESHOOTING Are you home educating and just need a little extra help with difficult concepts? I can fill in those gaps for you. TEST PREPARATION Is your child about to take the PSAT, SAT or ACT where a high score can mean scholarship money? I can help prepare your child in a way that will maximize his score. CO-OPERATIVE INSTRUCTION Are you home educating but don't feel capable of teaching math?

item.title: Testimonials
item.description: Home Education Mom Sandy has helped make what seemed impossible, possible. She has an excelllent way of relating the concepts and recognizes the roadblocks that may prevent future success. ~ Sherry J. Home Education Mom My son has had the privilege of sitting under Sandy's tutelage and I am amazed at how very far she has taken him. She is incredibly thorough and does not let her students progress without full understanding.
